name: Alien Planet (itch) (IsaacGames)
description:
This is a small experimental game made for Retro Game Jam: Sci-fi. Explore a lush alien planet by spaceship or on foot. You also have a jetpack to help you get around, but keep in mind it doesn't work as well at high altitudes.

Use the arrow keys to move and x to leave and enter your spaceship.

This project was practice for making more detailed, immersive environments by merging handmade and procedurally generated methods, within the strict confines of pico-8. Not my best work, but I learned a lot.
